short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save the link from the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The GrabTheLink Chrome extension helps you to save the link from the current tab so that you do not need to keep the tab open. You can open the extension to view the saved links and also use the search functionality to search your links easily.

Click the "auto link" button to automatically save the link of the current tab or click add your own title and click "save input" button to add your own title. 

You can also click the search button to search your saved links.
